sentences.en: Freezing isn't a bad way of preserving food.
sentences.cn: 冷冻不失为保存食品的一种好方法。

sentences.en: He spoke about preserving the country as a secular state.
sentences.cn: 他谈到保持该国的非宗教国性质。

sentences.en: The committee assesses whether a building is worth preserving.
sentences.cn: 由该委员会评定建筑物是否值得保存。
